person_say: I've been really stressed lately, and it's keeping me up at night.
animal_say: Oh dear! Sounds like you've got a lot on your mind. There's a wonderful bear named Bruno who specializes in mindfulness and relaxation. Would you like to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds lovely! I would love to get some calming mindfulness tips from him.
animal_say: Great choice! Let me call Bruno over so he can share some calming mindfulness tips with you. You'll feel more relaxed in no time!
